page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
IN PARTS OF OUR AREA THERE IS A VERY HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT RATE (41%) ESPECIALLY IN DRUMCHAPEL AND KNIGHTSWOOD,WHEREAS IN BEARSDEN THERE IS A VERY LOW UNEMPLOYMENT RATE WITH MOST WORKERS ENGAGED IN OFFICE WORK OR SELF EMPLOYED.DRUMCHAPEL AND KNIGHTSWOOD GAINED THESE HIGH RATES WHEN THE GOODYEAR AND SINGER FACTORIES CLOSED DOWN WITH A LOSS OF 10000 JOBS.
THE LARGEST EMPLOYER IN THE AREA IS BARR & STROUD LTD AND SUPPLY FACTORIES TO THIS COMPANY IN THE AREA PROVIDE FURTHER JOBS. OTHER JOBS ARE MOSTLY IN THE SERVICE INDUSTRIES EG SHOPS. THERE IS A GREAT CONTRAST BETWEEN THE SHOPS IN DRUMCHAPEL AND BEARSDEN. DUE TO HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT THE SHOPPING CENTRE IN DRUMCHAPEL IS ALMOST LIKE A GHOST-TOWN.
